sj224.tflp.dice

Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • sj224.tflp.dice.Die
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExplodingDie, FudgeDie

    public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single arbitrary die. This class itself represents a standard die of from two to arbitrarily many sides, but can be subclassed to represent special kinds of dice or die rolls.
    Author:
    Johnathan Waugh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a Die object with a set number of sides.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the die being used. It is suggested that you use algebraic dice notation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
